message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, Alice. You can't complain about 70%!
You're not giving me enough, Bob. I'm willing to give you a small portion, but I need more for myself.
I'll give you a bit more, Alice. But I'm not going to give away the farm. You're getting a good deal, so take it or leave it.
